
---
title: "GetRegion"

meta_desc: "Explore the GetRegion function of the AWS package, including examples, input properties, output properties, and supporting types. `aws.getRegion` provides details about a specific AWS region."
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

`aws.getRegion` provides details about a specific AWS region.

As well as validating a given region name this resource can be used to
discover the name of the region configured within the provider. The latter
can be useful in a child module which is inheriting an AWS provider
configuration from its parent module.


{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Aws = Pulumi.Aws;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var current = Output.Create(Aws.GetRegion.InvokeAsync());
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v3/go/aws"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := aws.GetRegion(ctx, nil, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```
